languages.text: {n}Глаза Маражая вспыхивают темным огнем, но он тут же с подчеркнутой покорностью опускает голову.{/n} "Я забылся, {name}. Больше подобного не повторится".
{n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Маражая вспыхивают темным огнем, но он тут же с подчеркнутой покорностью опускает голову.{/n} "Я забылся, {name}. Больше подобного не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head with emphatic deference.{/n} "I forget myself, {name}. This will not happen again."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un fuego siniestro arde en los ojos de Marazhai, pero enseguida baja la cabeza con en señal de deferencia.{/n} «He hablado cuando no me correspondía, {name}. No volverá a suceder».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un fuego siniestro arde en los ojos de Marazhai, pero enseguida baja la cabeza con una deferencia vehemente.{/n} «He olvidado mi lugar, {name}. No volverá a suceder».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的眼睛里闪烁着黑色的火焰，但他迅速低下头，充满了恭顺的意味。{/n}“我太得意忘形了，{name}。这种事情不会再发生了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的眼睛里闪烁着黑色的火焰，但他迅速低下头，表示出强烈的恭顺。{/n}“是我一时得意忘形，{name}。这种事情不会再发生了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Des flammes sombres brûlent dans les yeux de Marazhai, mais il incline rapidement la tête avec déférence.{/n} « Mes paroles ont dépassé ma pensée, {name}. Cela ne se reproduira pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Des flammes sombres brûlent dans les yeux de Marazhai, mais il incline rapidement la tête avec déférence.{/n} « J'admets avoir outrepassé mes droits, {name}. Ça ne se reproduira pas. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの目は暗い炎で燃え上がっていたが、彼はすぐに頭を下げて敬意を表した。{/n}「余計なことを言ってしまった、{name}。二度とこんなことはしない」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの目は暗い炎で燃え上がっていたが、彼はすぐに頭を下げて敬意を表した。{/n}「余計なことを言ってしまった、{name}。二度とこんなことはしない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}In Marazhais Augen lodert ein dunkles Feuer, doch er senkt augenblicklich den Kopf, eine Geste der Unterwürfigkeit.{/n} "Meine Worte waren unbedacht, {name}. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Marazhais Augen lodert ein dunkles Feuer, doch er senkt augenblicklich und mit deutlicher Unterwürfigkeit den Kopf.{/n} "Ich habe mich vergessen, {name}. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, karanlık bir alevle yansa da saygı numarasını sürdürmek için başını vakit kaybetmeden eğiyor.{/n} "Yersiz konuştum {name}. Aynısı bir daha yaşanmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with dark fire, but he promptly lowers his head in a show of deference.{/n} "I spoke out of turn, {name}. It will not happen again."
